content.raw: I don't think we know what the motor units are.  The motors of course rotate, but due to the large gear ratio they rotate much faster than the joints, so the robot will not return the actual rotation angle of the motor.  And they are not in one-to-one correspondence with the joints due to the elaborate coupling...  so it will be confusing to tell people that the motor units are radians.
